liyafan82 commented on pull request #6087: ARROW-7461: [Java] fix typos
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6087#discussion_r360747158
 
 

 ##########
 File path: java/flight/src/main/java/org/apache/arrow/flight/FlightServerMiddleware.java
 ##########
 @@ -87,7 +87,7 @@
   void onCallCompleted(CallStatus status);
 
   /**
-   * Callback for when an RPC method implementation throws an uncaught exception.
+   * Callback for when an RPC method implementation throws a uncaught exception.
 
 Review comment:
   This is a litle nit:
   According to my (poor) English knowledge, it should be "an" here? Could someone please help explain it? :-)
 
----------------------------------------------------------------
